userFit.title: Is PandaTrack right for me?
userFit.subtitle: If you love collecting but keeping track of your purchases has become chaos… yes, this is for you.

card1.title: Where did that purchase go?
card1.description: Bought on Instagram, paid via WhatsApp, confirmation in your inbox… and now it’s lost in chats and screenshots. If that sounds familiar, you know the stress.

card2.title: What do I have on the way?
card2.description: Some orders arrive fast, others sit in “limbo” for weeks. And there you are again: “what’s the status of my order?”. Don’t worry, you’re not alone.

card3.title: No more surprise payments
card3.description: Pre-order here, 20% deposit there, “the rest when it arrives”… until a payment shows up you didn’t see coming. Having it clear ahead of time feels amazing.

faqs.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to know about PandaTrack and how it can help you stay on top of your collection.

items.question: What is PandaTrack?
items.answer: PandaTrack is a web app that keeps all your collectible purchases in one place: stores, orders, pre-orders, shipments, and payments. No more digging through chats or inboxes.

items.question: Who is it for?
items.answer: Collectors who buy from multiple stores (Instagram, WhatsApp, websites) and want one place to see what they bought, what's on the way, and what they still need to pay.

items.question: Why not just use my email or a spreadsheet?
items.answer: Emails and spreadsheets scatter info across threads and tabs. PandaTrack is built for collectors: one dashboard, clear statuses, and reminders so nothing slips through.

items.question: What can I track?
items.answer: Stores you buy from, each purchase with items and dates, pre-orders with deposits and remaining balance, and shipments, including split shipments per order.

items.question: Will I see what I still owe?
items.answer: Yes. You get a clear view of remaining balances and upcoming payments by month, so pre-order payments don't catch you off guard.

items.question: What about shipments?
items.answer: Track multiple shipments per order, carrier and tracking when available, and status: waiting at store, shipped, in transit, or delivered.

items.question: Are there reminders?
items.answer: You can set reminders to follow up on long pre-orders, prepare for upcoming payments, and nudge when a shipment goes quiet for too long.

items.question: Can I set a budget?
items.answer: Optional monthly budget with alerts when you're approaching your limit, so collecting stays fun without the stress.

items.question: When can I use it?
items.answer: We're building the first version now. Join the waitlist and we'll notify you as soon as PandaTrack is ready to try.

items.question: How do I join the waitlist?
items.answer: Drop your email in the form below. We'll only reach out when we're ready for you. No spam, just one heads-up.
